S04bsu035_u:2249: Suv_19.65 yāvatsmṛtiṃ labhyate punaḥ sthitau hi ādīpta paśyanti diśaścatastraḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2250: muhūrta tiṣṭhanti patanti bhūmau kāruṇasvareṇa paridevayanti //
S04bsu035_u:2252: Suv_19.66 tā ūrdhvabāhu satataṃ sthihanti varṇamudīrantayorbhrātarasya
S04bsu035_u:2253: sa caiva rājā hṛdi dīnacittaḥ putraviyogātsuvikṣiptacittaḥ //
S04bsu035_u:2254: Suv_19.67 śokapraviddhaḥ paridevayitvā evaṃ hi rājā paridevayanti /
S04bsu035_u:2255: ekaśca me putra priyamanāpaḥ grasta kaniṣṭho vanarākṣasena //
S04bsu035_u:2256: Suv_19.68 mā me imau anya ca dvau hi putra śokāgninā jīvitasaṃkṣayaṃ vrajet /
S04bsu035_u:2257: yannūna haṃ śīghra vrajeya tatra paśyeya putrau priyadarśanau tau //
S04bsu035_u:2258: Suv_19.69 śīghreṇa yānena ca rājadhānīṃ praveśayedrājakulānta śīghram /
S04bsu035_u:2259: mā eṣā māturhi janetu kāmaṃ śokāgninā taddhṛdaya sphaṭe tat //
S04bsu035_u:2260: Suv_19.70 putrau ca dṛṣṭvā labhate praśāntiṃ na jīvitenālabhate viyogam /
S04bsu035_u:2261: rājāpi cāmātyagaṇena sārdhaṃ dvipābhirūḍho gata tatra darśitu //
S04bsu035_u:2262: Suv_19.71 dṛṣṭvā ca putrau bhrātṛnāmāhvānau karuṇāsvaraṃ krandatau āttamānā /
S04bsu035_u:2263: rājā hi tatputradvayaṃ gṛhītvā prarodamānopi puraṃ vrajitvā /
S04bsu035_u:2264: sā śīghraśīghraṃ tvaramāna svaputrāṃ devīṃ adarśetsutaputrakāmām //
S04bsu035_u:2265: Suv_19.72 ahaṃ ca sa śākyamunistathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ mahāsattvavaro babhūva //
S04bsu035_u:2266: putraśca rājño hi mahārathasya yenaiva vyāghrī sukhitā kṛtāsīt //
S04bsu035_u:2267: Suv_19.73 śuddhodano hi varapārthivendro mahāratho nāma babhūva rājā /
S04bsu035_u:2270: vyāghrī abhūttatra mahāprajāpatī vyāghrīsutā pañcaka amī hi bhikṣavaḥ //
S04bsu035_u:2271_0: atha mahārā ā mahādevī va bahuvidhakaruṇāparidevanaṃ kṛtvā bharaṇānyevamucya mahato
S04bsu035_u:2271_1: anakāyena sārdhaṃ putrasya śarīrapū āṃ kṛtvāsminpradeśe tasya mahāsattvasyeme śarīrā
S04bsu035_u:2272: tatra devena mahāsattvenāsyai vyāghryā ātmabhāvaṃ parityaktam /
S04bsu035_u:2273: evaṃ rūpaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ karuṇayā kṛtam /
S04bsu035_u:2274: imaṃ mayā śarīrasya parideśanā 'nāgate 'dhvani gaṇanāsamatikrāntaiḥ kalpaiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ buddhakāyaṃ ca kāritā /
S04bsu035_u:2275: asmindeśane nirdiśyamāna aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sadevamānuṣikāyāḥ pra āyāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu035_u:2278: sa ca stūpo buddhādhiṣṭhānena tatraivāntardhānamanuprāpta iti //
S04bsu035_u:2284: upasaṃkramya tasya suvarṇaratnākaracchatrakūṭasya tathāgarasya pādau śirasā banditvaikānte sthitāni kṛtāñ alibhūtāni taṃ suvarṇaratnākaracchatrakūṭaṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭavitsuḥ //
S04bsu035_u:2289: Suv_20.3 brahmeśvaraṃ susvarabrahmaghoṣaṃ siṃheśvaraṃ gar itameghaghoṣam /
S04bsu035_u:2291: Suv_20.4 sunirmalaṃ suvimalate asuprabhaṃ puṇyaṃ śatalakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtaṃ inam /
S04bsu035_u:2293: Suv_20.5 paramasattvahitānukampanaṃ paramaṃ lokeṣu sukhasya dāyakam /
S04bsu035_u:2296: Suv_20.6 amṛtasya sukhasya dāyakaṃ maitrībalavīrya upāyavantam /
S04bsu035_u:2299: Suv_20.7 etatsaṃkṣiptaṃ mayā prakāśitaṃ kiṃ cidguṇabinduguṇārṇavodbhavam /
S04bsu035_u:2300: yacca samupacitapuṇyasaṃcayaṃ tena sattvaḥ prāpnyatu bodhimuttamām //
S04bsu035_u:2301_0: atha khalu ruciraketubodhisattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prāvaritvā dakṣiṃṇa
S04bsu035_u:2301_1: ānu maṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñ aliṃ praṇamayitvā tasyāṃ
S04bsu035_u:2302: Suv_20.8 sa tvaṃ munīndra śatapuṇyalakṣaṇa sahasraśrīcāruguṇairalaṃkṛtam /
S04bsu035_u:2306: Suv_20.10 na bhāsate va ramivendraparvatān prabhāvilāsābhiranantakoṭibhiḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2309: apūrvavarṇo vira o virā ase yathaiva muktaṃ bhramarākulaprabham //
S04bsu035_u:2314: Suv_20.13 tvayā hi prahlādakarī sukhaṃkarī śubhākaraṃ sarvasukhākarāgamam /
S04bsu035_u:2316: Suv_20.14 virā ase tvaṃ dyumaṇīrivāṃśubhiḥ yatho valaṃ tvaṃ gagaṇe 'rkamaṇḍalam /
S04bsu035_u:2319: dantāvaliste mukhato virā ate sadrā ahaṃsairiva cāntarīkṣam //
S04bsu035_u:2322: iti śrīsuvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarā e sarvatathāgatastavaparivarto nāma viṃśatitamaḥ //
S04bsu035_u:2326: atha khalu bodhisattvasaṃmuccayā nāma kuladevatā hṛṣṭatuṣṭā tasyaṃ velāyāmimābhirgāthābhirbhagavantaṃ tuṣṭāva //
S04bsu035_u:2327: Suv_21.1 namo 'stu buddhāya suviśuddhabodhaye viśuddhadharmā pratibhāmubuddhaye /
S04bsu035_u:2329: Suv_21.2 aho aho buddhamanakṣate asaṃ aho aho sāgaramerutulyam /
S04bsu035_u:2332: yena dṛśaṃ bhāṣita sūtramuttamaṃ sarveṣu sattvāmanugrahārtham //
S04bsu035_u:2333: Suv_21.4 śānteśvaraḥ śākyamunistathāgataḥ sattvottamaḥ śāntapure praviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu035_u:2334: gambhīraśāstā vira ā samādhiḥ yadanupraviṣṭo inabuddhagocare //
S04bsu035_u:2335: Suv_21.5 śūnyāśca kāyāstatha śrāvakāṇāṃ vihāraśūnyā dvipadottamānām /
S04bsu035_u:2336: te sarvadharmāḥ prakṛtyā ca śūnyāḥ sattvāpi śūnyātma na ātu vidyate //
S04bsu035_u:2337: Suv_21.6 nityaṃ ca nityaṃ ca ina smarāmi nityaṃ ca śocāmi inasya darśanam /
S04bsu035_u:2338: satataṃ ca nityaṃ praṇidhiṃ karomi saṃbuddha sūryasya ca darśanārtham //
S04bsu035_u:2339: Suv_21.7 sthāpyeha nityaṃ dharaṇīṣu ānu atiśokatapto 'smi inasya darśane /
S04bsu035_u:2341: Suv_21.8 śokāgninā pra valito 'smi samanta nityaṃ dadāhi me darśanatoya śītalam /
S04bsu035_u:2343: Suv_21.9 kāruṇyabhāvaṃ kuru mahya nāyaka dadāhi me darśana saumyarūpaṃ /
S04bsu035_u:2344: tvayā hi trātā agadeva deśitaḥ śūnyāśca kāyastatha śrāvakāṇām //
S04bsu035_u:2346: sarve ca sattvāḥ supina svabhāvā mahāntaśūnyāḥ svaya nāyakasya //
S04bsu035_u:2348: sādhu sādhu te kuladevate śāstā dadāti sādhu te kuladevate punaśca sādhviti //
